SELECT (@rownumber := @rownumber + 1) AS indexMaFingerprint, a.* FROM ( SELECT
mu.id idMaUser, mu.`name` nameMaUser, mu.codeMaFingerprint code, ow.id idOpWorkOrder, ow.`name` nameOpWorkOrder FROM opWorkOrder ow LEFT JOIN opDevice od ON od.midOpWorkOrder = ow.id LEFT JOIN opDeviceCabinet oc ON oc.id = od.idOpDeviceCabinet LEFT JOIN opDeviceElectricianCard oec ON oec.idOpDevice = od.id LEFT JOIN maUser mu ON mu.id = oec.idElectrician LEFT JOIN maFingerprint mf ON mf.idMaUser = mu.id WHERE oc.id = #{idOpDeviceCabinet} AND oec.statusElectrician != 'or' AND mu.codeMaFingerprint IS NOT NULL GROUP BY mu.id ) a, (SELECT @rownumber := 0) b;
